io.proximax.sdk.infrastructure

Interface HttpClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OkHttpHttpClient

    public interface HttpClient
    generic HTTP client API get/post/put methods taking relative path parameter assume that client implementation is aware of the base URL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> get(java.lang.String path)
      make GET request with path relative to the base URL throws UnsupportedOperationException when client implementation is not aware of base URL
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> getAbs(java.lang.String absoluteUrl)
      make GET request with path relative to the base URL
      okhttp3.WebSocket newWebSocket(okhttp3.Request request, okhttp3.WebSocketListener webSocketListener)
      create new web socket using the HTTP client
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> post(java.lang.String path, com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
      make POST request with path relative to the base URL throws UnsupportedOperationException when client implementation is not aware of base URL
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> postAbs(java.lang.String absoluteUrl, com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
      make POST request with path relative to the base URL
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> put(java.lang.String path, com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
      make PUT request with path relative to the base URL throws UnsupportedOperationException when client implementation is not aware of base URL
      io.reactivex.Observable<HttpResponse> putAbs(java.lang.String absoluteUrl, com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
      make PUT request with path relative to the base URL

                               okhttp3.WebSocketListener webSocketListener)
        create new web socket using the HTTP client
        Parameters:
